purpleculture_pinyin:
shè
to take in; to absorb; to assimilate; to act for; to take a photo; photo shoot; photo; to conserve (one's health)
взять в; Абсорбировать; ассимилировать; действовать для; сделать фото; фотосессия; Фото; сберечь (свое здоровье)
rtega_mnemonic:
攝攝RS
摄摄		摂take in, absorb, act as deputy, administer, assist
  • hand 扌 near the ear 聶/聂 trying to help absorb a whisper 聶/聂
  • 摄 → 摂
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 摄)
Pictophonetic: 聶 indicates the sound; 扌 (hand) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
攝影 [ shè yǐng ]: to take a photograph; photography; to shoot (a movie)
攝氏度 [ shè shì dù ]: ; °C (degrees Celsius)
攝製 [ shè zhì ]: to produce (a TV show etc)
攝像機 [ shè xiàng jī ]: video camera; Classifiers: 部
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 扌 [ shǒu ] hand
    • 聶 [ niè ] to whisper; surname
heisig_chinese_memo: To take a photo these days it's dangerous sometimes like when people take selfies. It's difficult to press the button with your fingers while you are holding your phone and trying to keep all three ears open for any people, bikes, or cars that are coming.
Ru_trainchinese: shè: (графема) делать фотографию, снимать; впитывать, усваивать; действовать в чьих-л. интересах
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: To take a photo of a wedding pair (couple) that looks nice you need to place your finger directly over the picture taking button so you dont' miss it and make sure their ears can hear you when you say "Say cheeeese!"
humanum_full_description_en:
From " hand " to " Nie " sound. The original meaning is to raise and pull. "Shuowen": "Photograph, lead and hold. Congshou, Nie Sheng." Duan Yucai's note: "Introduction and holding." Such as "The Analects. "Xiang Dang": "Shooting Qi Shengtang, bowing like a ya, holding your breath as if you are not resting." Zhu Xi's note: "Taking, picking clothes." "Warring States. "Chu Ce III": "The emperor patrols hunting, the princes set up houses, take them in Guan Jian, take a few of them, and take meals in the hall."

" Photography " also means to rectify and organize. Such as "Historical Records. Biography of Wei Gongzi: "Hou Sheng photographed his clothes, and went straight to the son and sat on him, not letting him down, and wanted to see him." "The Biography of Xiaoqi": "(Xiao) first ascended into battle, killed more than 50 people, was hit in the middle of the forehead, and regained the battle, and it was broken."

" Photo " means jurisdiction and command. Such as "Hou Han Shu. "The Legend of Fu Zhan": "Every time a car goes on an expedition, he often stays in the guard, and is the chief photographer." "Three Kingdoms. Wei Shu. "Chen Liu Wang Huan Biography": "Ren Chen, the prince of Jin, Yanshao, was entrusted with the throne. He had a total of 100 photos and a catalogue of objects, all as before."

" Photo " means acting and concurrently. "Guang Yun. "Ye Yun": "Photograph, Jianye." Such as "Zuo Zhuan. "The Thirteenth Year of Zhaogong": "Sheep tongue carp photographed Sima, and then joined the princes in Pingqiu." Du Yu's note: "Photograph, concurrently an official." "Historical Records. "Yan Zhao Gong Family": "Wang Jiyou, Zhou Gong regent, practiced Zuo when the country, and called the public doubt, as "Jun Xi"." And also expressed assistance. Such as "Poetry. Daya. "Be Drunk": "A friend can take pictures, and take pictures with majesty." Mao Chuan: "Those who speak with each other are majestic."

" Photo " means arrest. Such as "Mandarin. "Wu Yu": "Simaz and Wang Shi are five people, sitting in front of the king." Wei Zhao's note: "Photo, hold it." And it means to close. Such as "Zhuangzi. "Pangpi": "For the defense of Pangpi to detect the thief of the sac, you must take a scorpion, and solidify it." Guo Xiang's note: "The sage, the scorpion, are all ropes." Tighten the rope.

" Photo " means the folder. Such as "The Analects. Advanced": "The country of a thousand vehicles is taken among the great countries." "Han Shu. "The Five Elements": "Zheng Yi Xiaoguo photographed between Jin and Chu. He emphasized the power of Wu and Zheng was the brunt. He couldn't cultivate morality, so he would die in the Three Kingdoms."

" Photo " means to ingest and attract. Such as "Heguanzi. "Shi Bing": "Heaven and earth do not lean, wait for energy when you make mistakes, powers are used together, yin and yang are attacked, life and death are photographed, and aura is extinguished." Photograph the feathers, correspondingly."
humanum_short_description_en: From " hand " to " Nie " sound. The original meaning is to raise and pull.
humanum_full_description:
從「手」，「聶」聲。本義是提起、拉。《說文》：「攝，引持也。从手，聶聲。」段玉裁注：「謂引進而持之也。」如《論語．鄉黨》：「攝齊升堂，鞠躬如也，屏氣似不息者。」朱熹注：「攝，摳衣也。」《戰國策．楚策三》：「天子巡狩，諸侯辟舍，納于筦鍵，攝衽抱几，視膳於堂下。」

　　「攝」也表示整頓、整理。如《史記．魏公子列傳》：「侯生攝敝衣冠，直上載公子上坐，不讓，欲以觀公子。」《後漢書．銚期傳》：「（銚）期先登陷陣，手殺五十餘人，被創中額，攝幘復戰，遂大破之。」

　　「攝」表示管轄、統領。如《後漢書．伏湛傳》：「車駕每出征伐，常留鎮守，總攝群司。」《三國志．魏書．陳留王奐傳》：「壬辰，晉太子炎紹封襲位，總攝百揆，備物典冊，一皆如前。」

　　「攝」表示代理、兼任。《廣韻．葉韻》：「攝，兼也。」如《左傳．昭公十三年》：「羊舌鮒攝司馬，遂合諸侯于平丘。」杜預注：「攝，兼官。」《史記．燕召公世家》：「王既幼，周公攝政，當國踐祚，召公疑之，作〈君奭〉。」又表示輔助。如《詩．大雅．既醉》：「朋友攸攝，攝以威儀。」毛傳：「言相攝佐者以威儀也。」

　　「攝」表示拘捕。如《國語．吳語》：「攝少司馬茲與王士五人，坐於王前。」韋昭注：「攝，執也。」又表示收束。如《莊子．胠篋》：「將為胠篋探囊發匱之盜而為守備，則必攝緘縢，固扃鐍。」郭象注：「緘、縢，皆繩也。」「攝緘縢」即收緊繩索。

　　「攝」表示夾處。如《論語．先進》：「千乘之國，攝乎大國之間。」《漢書．五行志》：「鄭以小國攝乎晉楚之間，重以彊吳，鄭當其衝，不能修德，將鬭三國，以自危亡。」

　　「攝」表示攝取、吸引。如《鶡冠子．世兵》：「天地不倚，錯以待能，度數相使，陰陽相攻，死生相攝，氣威相滅。」唐代顧況〈廣陵白沙大雲寺碑〉：「磁石攝鐵，不攝鴻毛，相應故。」
humanum_short_description: 從「手」，「聶」聲。本義是提起、拉。
_purpleculture_dictionary_orig_full:
攝 (Simplified: 摄)
Pinyin: shè
English Definition: to take in; to absorb; to assimilate; to act for; to take a photo; photo shoot; photo; to conserve (one's health)
Total strokes: 21; Radical: 手
Pictophonetic: 聶 indicates the sound; 扌 (hand) conveys the meaning.
Character Formation:
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 扌 [ shǒu ] hand
    • 聶 [ niè ] to whisper; surname
Example Words:
攝影 [ shè yǐng ]: to take a photograph; photography; to shoot (a movie)
攝氏度 [ shè shì dù ]: ; °C (degrees Celsius)
攝製 [ shè zhì ]: to produce (a TV show etc)
攝像機 [ shè xiàng jī ]: video camera; Classifiers: 部
More: 攝* | *攝 | *攝*

摄摄 		摂 take in, absorb, act as deputy, administer, assist
  • hand 扌 near the ear 聶/聂 trying to help absorb a whisper 聶/聂
  • 摄 → 摂
(Simplified: 摄)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 聶 indicates the sound; 扌 (hand) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 扌 [ shǒu ] hand
    • 聶 [ niè ] to whisper; surname
①拿，吸取：攝取。攝像。攝影。攝食。
②保養：攝生。攝重(zhòng)。珍攝。
③代理：攝行(xíng)(代職務)。攝政(代君主管理國家)。
④捕捉：勾攝。
⑤迫近：“攝乎大國之間”。
⑥古同“懾”，怕，使害怕。

攝氏度 [ shè shì dù ]:; °C (degrees Celsius)
攝製 [ shè zhì ]: to produce (a TV show etc)
攝像機 [ shè xiàng jī ]: video camera; Classifiers: 部

Kind: traditional

攝字的基本解释

攝
shè

攝
niè
均见“摄”。

攝字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shè］
［《廣韻》書涉切，入葉，書。］
亦作“挕1”。“摄1”的繁体字。
(1)提起；牵引。
(2)执持。
(3)巩固；持久。
(4)佐理；辅助。
(5)假代；代理。
(6)兼职。
(7)委派。
(8)唐以后谓诏除而非正命为摄。
(9)统率；管辖。
(10)夹处。
(11)整顿；整饬。
(12)缘边。参见“攝服”。
(13)捉拿，拘捕。
(14)收敛；吸引。
(15)保养。
(16)谓神灵鬼怪等以法术摄召人或物。
(17)拍照。
(18)借贷。
(19)音韵学术语。参见“攝音”。
(20)见“攝攝”。
(21)春秋时齐地名。在今山东省聊城县境内。
(22)通“懾”。畏惧；威胁。
(23)通“躡”。踩；踏。
(24)姓。春秋楚国有摄叔。见《左传·宣公十二年》。
[②]［zhé］
［《集韻》質涉切，入葉，章。］
“摄2”的繁体字。
(1)折叠。
(2)见“攝2葉”。
[③]［niè］

攝字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　攝； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页463第33
【唐韻】書涉切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】失涉切，?音歙。【說文】引持也。【左傳·成十六年】請攝飮焉。【魯語】其爲後世昭前之令聞也，使長監於世，故能攝固，不解以久。【前漢·張耳?餘傳】吏嘗以過笞餘，餘欲起，耳攝使受笞。　又收斂也。【詩·大雅】朋友攸攝，攝以威義。【疏】相攝斂而佐助之以威儀之事也。【莊子·胠篋篇】攝緘縢，固扃鐍。【註】攝，猶結也。　又整飭也。【儀禮·士冠禮】再醮攝酒。【疏】更撓攪添益，整頓示新也。【史記·荆軻傳】吾曩者目攝之。【註】怒視以攝整之也。　又總也，兼也，代也。【禮·喪服小記】士不攝大夫。【疏】士喪無主。不敢使大夫兼攝爲主也。又【曾子問】卿大夫士，從攝主，北面于西階南。【註】攝主上卿，代君聽國政。【左傳·成二年】攝官承乏。一曰假也。【禮·檀弓】伯高之喪，冉子攝束帛乗馬而將之。【註】攝猶貸也。　又錄也，追也，捕也。　又讋服也。【前漢·霍去病傳】攝讋者弗取。【註】謂振動失志氣者，則赦也。　又龜名。【爾雅·釋魚】三曰攝龜。　又【唐韻】

攝字的源字形

字源演变：
